text_block_list.text: On the night of the Selection Race, Rice Shower was found near the tree stump, crying profusely.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I, I'm sorry, but please don't come any closer…
choice_data_list: Why is that?
Why is that?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Because if you come any closer, you'll become unhappy. I'll just end up causing you more trouble because… I'm a useless girl…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Even though I don't want to become useless anymore… even though I tried hard and entered into the race. In the end I couldn't…
Seeing the crying girl in front of me, I couldn't help but remember the way she looked the other day.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: But even still I have to do my best!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Because the Selection Race is already decided, I have to make sure to compete, run properly, and then…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'll debut, compete in a lot of races, and then I'll no longer be just a useless girl.
Although I didn't know the details, I could tell from her harsh training that she desperately wanted to change.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: In the end… I really couldn't…
I couldn't let her go on like this!
choice_data_list: Rice Shower! I want to scout you!
Rice Shower! I want to scout you!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Me? Scout? You want to become my trainer?
choice_data_list: If you would be ok it.
If you would be ok it.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: N-n-no I would be happy if you would become my trainer, but…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I really am a useless girl… I know I'll end up causing lots of problems, and I even ended up not showing up to my race…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Even after all of that is it ok?
choice_data_list: Even then, I still want you.
Even then, I still want you.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Amazing. You're like a big brother…
choice_data_list: A big brother?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Amazing. You're like a big sister…
choice_data_list: A big brother?
A big sister?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Eeep! I-it's nothing please don't mind what I said!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: At any rate… Please take good care of me Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'll do my best!
Although it was still a bit awkward, she still managed to show the best smile she could muster.
After this meeting, I waited for Rice Shower at the course to begin our first training session.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Heave-ho, heave-ho…
Carrying a large rucksack that was bulging from seam to seam, Rice Shower arrived at the course after laying the bag down making an audible thud as it hit the ground.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Haah, haah, I'm sorry for making you wait! I'm looking forward to our training together!
choice_data_list: What's with the bag?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: That's… In case something went wrong, I prepared some things just in case, like bandages or tape in case of a fall…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: An umbrella and a change of clothes in case of a sudden rain, some mayonnaise in case something happens on the way back home.
choice_data_list: You're incredibly well prepared.
You're incredibly well prepared.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: It's just… because it's my first day of training, I just wanted to make sure that nothing goes wrong. Am I… am I being weird?
choice_data_list: Why would something go wrong?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ever since I was young I would always cause misfortune for others.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Girls that were near me would fall, or have their shoe laces snap… and when it gets really bad, there's even been a time when a bird pooped on someone's head…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'm always causing trouble for others because… I'm a useless girl…
Although this all just sounded like normal bad luck, even if I told Rice Shower she probably wouldn't believe it.
choice_data_list: (She really is a kind hearted girl…)
(She really is a kind hearted girl…)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Oh no! I'm sorry I ended up talking on and on!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Please! Let's get started on our training!
And so began our first day of training. Working diligently, Rice Shower completed each part of the training menu.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Haah, haah…! What was my time?
choice_data_list: Amazing! You're even faster than I expected!
Amazing! You're even faster than I expected!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Really? Thank goodness!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: If it's alright with you, would it be ok if I ran 1 more time? I'm still completely fine and I can still run!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: That tip you gave me for handling the curves, I just want to make sure I have it down.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: And I'm starting to get a feel for how to handle the change in speed on a downslope! Would it be ok…?
choice_data_list: Of course!
Of course!

text_block_list.text: As Rice Shower was both diligent and a fast learner, from start to finish the training went along smoothly.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah… the suns already gone down so much.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I was so excited while running that I hadn't noticed at all…
choice_data_list: It's good that you managed to enjoy your training until the end.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yes! The training was really fun! Because you're so nice you really are like an older brother.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yes! The training was really fun! Because you're so nice you really are like an older sister.
[Growl～]

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ahhh! Excuse me! Please pretend that you didn't hear that!
As a reward for finishing the first day of training, we went out to treat ourselves to some food.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Umm, Trainer? Is it really ok to eat anything I want?
choice_data_list: Since it's a reward, ask me for anything that you want!
Since it's a reward, ask me for anything that you want!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Anything! Anything. Anything I want…
As she was looking around, her eyes became drawn to a ramen shop that was advertising their "Explosive Mega DX Ramen"…
However just as she had made up her mind, right as we began heading towards the shop…

text_block_list.name: Ramen Stallkeeper
text_block_list.text: Thank you everyone, we are now currently sold out on the Explosive Mega! Please come again tomorrow for this deal!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah! Huh…
choice_data_list: Rice, you can order as many toppings as you want.
Rice, you can order as many toppings as you want.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: R-really!?
Although it was unexpected seeing how much food Rice Shower could eat, the first day of training ended with the two of us sharing a meal with big smiles on our faces…
